name: Mary

responses.Big Footprint: Those would fit yes, but they'd probably fit %NPC better.
responses.Small Footprint: Not mine, way too small for me. Try %NPC.
responses.Glasses: Not sure why it matters, but yes. %NPC and I both do.
responses.Bag: Not mine, I already have a bag. Could be %NPC's though.
responses.Lipstick: Yes, I have just got some new lipstick actually... I think %NPC took it?
responses.Right Handed: I am right handed. So is %NPC. What does that prove?
responses.Dark Hair: No, my hair is not particularly dark. %NPC's is though.
responses.Erotic Novel: Where did you get that?! I let %NPC borrow it, not you!
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: Hey that might be mine! But it's badly damaged. It might be %NPC's instead.
responses.Car Keys: Why would I have a car of that make? Ew! Try %NPC.

noneResponses: Sorry I am far too busy for you
I really don't feel the need to help you.

motives.Colin: I caught him trying to curse my earlobe.
motives.Diana: That hair was an eyesore. I couldn't bear to look at it for another second.
motives.Lily: She was wearing the same dress I was... and looked better in it!
motives.Mike: It's not my fault! He beat me in a spelling test in primary school.
motives.Will: What kind of whackjob would make small talk about sound waves.
